channel.title: Tools on Cloud Native Buildpacks
channel.description: Recent content in Tools on Cloud Native Buildpacks

item.title: CircleCI
item.description: CircleCI is a continuous integration and delivery platform. The CNB project maintains an integration, called an orb, which allows users to run pack commands inside their pipelines.

item.title: Gitlab Auto DevOps
item.description: Gitlab is a web based DevOps platform. It uses pack as part of the Auto DevOps feature, to build applications prior to deploying them.

item.title: kpack
item.description: kpack is a Kubernetes native platform maintained by VMware under the VMware Tanzu project that utilizes unprivileged Kubernetes primitives to provide builds of OCI images as a platform implementation of Cloud Native Buildpacks (CNB).

item.title: Tekton
item.description: Tekton is an open-source CI/CD system platform implementation running on k8s. There are two Tekton tasks maintained by the CNB project, both of which use the lifecycle directly (i.e. they do not use pack).
